alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island North; Kauai East; Kauai North; Koolau Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued October 07 at 4:41PM HST until October 08 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI AND BIG ISLAND... .An incoming north swell will generate low-end advisory surf at least through early Saturday morning. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 10 to 15 feet. * WHERE...North facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai, Maui,and the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect strong breaking waves, shore break, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by ocean safety officials and exercise caution.
